Giant's Servant Hadel:
Legs Germunkusa also broke into small pieces.

It Master Ishuma . He just restore fossilized limbs Germunkusa. Will be as good as new.
Heir Force Giant. We must hurry. Take the fossilized arms and legs of Germunkusa to Master Ishuma . Of course, I am ready to pay him for the job. The main thing is that he restored the body of the Lord.
